column4: the application "comm" on my ubuntu machine is slower than my debian machine.  Same hardware, same setup, same files, same everything except ... one is using comm from ubuntu, one is using comm from debian.  The debian one finishes in 1-2 minutes.   The comm version on ubuntu takes upwards of 20+ minutes.
My question would be, is there a way to get a newer or older version of comm on ubuntu?
, its public secret that ubuntu is much, much slower than debian. and with bugs any more
are you being funny?  I'm asking how to get a newer version of 'comm' on my ubuntu box
